ARABIC: إِلَّا رَحْمَةً مِّن رَّبِّكَ إِنَّ فَضْلَهُۥ كَانَ عَلَيْكَ كَبِيرًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: but for a mercy from your Lord. His favour to you is indeed immense.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Unless your Lord have mercy. His blessings on you are great indeed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (Whatever you have received) is nothing but grace from your Lord. Indeed His favour to you is great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: except by the mercy of your Lord. He has certainly bestowed great favors on you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Except the mercy of your Lord; indeed His munificence upon you (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) is extremely great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Except as a mercy from your Lord. Verily, His grace unto you is ever great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But on account of mercy from your Lord-- surely His grace to you is abundant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: excepting by some mercy of thy Lord; surly His favour to thee is great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (It is naught) save mercy from thy Lord. Lo! His kindness unto thee was ever great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: except through the special mercy of your Lord. His favours towards you has been great indeed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Except as a mercy from thy Lord verily His grace unto thee is ever great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: except a mercy from your Lord. Indeed His grace has been great upon you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Except for Mercy from thy Lord: for his bounty is to thee (indeed) great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Except as a Mercy from your Lord. Verily! His Grace unto you (O Muhammad SAW) is ever great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: except for Mercy from your Lord; for His favor to you is great indeed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Except through a mercy from your Lord. His favors upon you have been great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Except [We have left it with you] as a mercy from your Lord. Indeed, His favor upon you has ever been great.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [17:87] [it is] only — but We have let it remain — as a mercy from your Lord. Truly His favour to you is ever great, tremendous, for He has revealed to you and granted you the praiseworthy station as well as other [kinds of] merit.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: ((It is naught) save mercy) blessing (from thy Lord) He preserved the Qur'an in your heart. (Lo! His kindness unto you) through granting you prophethood and Islam (was ever great) was tremendous indeed.
